snippet: This season’s tricky mission is to not take opponents’ slights lightly while being “the least-penalized team in the league.”
abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan is pressing team to be aggressive on both sides of the ball without drawing penalties.
lead_paragraph: This season’s tricky mission is to not take opponents’ slights lightly while being “the least-penalized team in the league.”

headline.main: Jets Seek Aggression but Don’t Want to Pay for It
headline.print_headline: Jets Seek Aggression but Don’t Want to Pay for It
